title: Strange But Viable Builds
body:
Hello,
Recently I have discovered some strange but viable builds like Ap Trynd{{champion:23}}  or Ad Braum{{champion:201}} . I was wondering if anyone knows any more strange builds like this.{{item:3175}} {{item:3410}} {{item:3416}}

replies.body:
i've seen an AP/attack speed {{champion:5}} do some serious shit

{{item:3124}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3065}}  or something

AD Sona Top. Believe me, I destroyed a Rumble and a Darius with this build
{{item:3042}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3026}}

Hybrid lux.

Build udyr with blue warrior - mobis - youmus - brutaliser - last whisper - triforce - sell boots for zephyr. You kill everything before the stun wears off. Obviously max tiger.
